Osa Conservation: Lifetime exploration Part 1 Raw data

Osa Conservation: Lifetime exploration Chris Beirne Part 1 Raw data This section summarizes the movement locations for all the tracking devices within Osa Conservation’s movement ecology project. Last data request: 2023-11-07 14:24:52.031903 The project currently contains 90 tag deployments and 1138128 locations. The number of species by country is: 1.0.1 Costa Rica Note this is raw unfiltered data We currently have deployed 46 devices in Costa Rica: 1.0.2 Peru We have deployed 40 devices in Peru: 1.0.3 Ecuador We have deployed 5 devices in Ecuador:

Part 2 Data cleaning All tracking devices come with errors, and each track must be checked visual and cleaned of outliers before analysis. This page shows this process for each animal within the project. It has been automated so that we always have access to a stardardised and cleaned locations database. Animals are cleaned in the order in which they occur in the database. 2.0.1 Vultures 2.0.2 Vulture summaries We first regularize all of the data to one our intervals, then calculate distance moved.
